text:
Botswana International University of Science and Technology (BIUST) saved the country $42.1 million in soap production by producing soap and sanitizers en masse.

They also built drones to deliver medical supplies and drone sprayers to disinfect the country to fight Coronavirus. https://t.co/5J3hSeT5B3

annotations.normalized_text: Botswana International University of Science and Technology
